paymentError.question: I'm getting a payment error. What should I do?
paymentError.answer: If you encounter a payment error, please contact support and specify which game you are referring to, which payment method you chose, and also attach a screenshot of the error and your game data (ID/email).

wrongUid.question: What should I do if I entered the wrong UID?
wrongUid.answer:
If you noticed the error before payment - just go back and enter the correct ID.

If you've already paid - contact support immediately:

Telegram: @Davo_dior55
WhatsApp: +7 (924) 004 0070
E-mail: hoyakap@gmail.com

The faster you write, the higher the chance to correct the order before shipping.

cancelOrder.question: Can I cancel or return my order?
cancelOrder.answer: After payment and transaction confirmation, the order is considered complete, and no refund is issued. However, if the order was placed in error — contact support. We will try to help as much as possible.

orderProcessing.question: What to do if the order is 'in processing'?
orderProcessing.answer: This status means that we have received your payment and it is being processed. If more than 30 minutes have passed and the diamonds have not arrived, contact us — we will check.

paymentNoDiamonds.question: What to do if the payment went through but diamonds didn't arrive?
paymentNoDiamonds.answer:
Make sure you have entered the correct ID. Check the order status in your personal account. Contact support and attach:

A screenshot of the payment
Your Bigo Live ID
E-mail specified during the order

whatAreDiamonds.question: What are Bigo Live diamonds and what are they for?
whatAreDiamonds.answer:
Diamonds are a virtual currency within the Bigo Live application, which can be used to:

Send gifts to your favorite streamers during broadcasts.
Get access to exclusive features and events.
Increase your account level and interaction with other users.

howToTopUp.question: How to top up Bigo Live balance on your website?
howToTopUp.answer: Select the desired diamond package. Proceed to checkout. Enter your Bigo Live ID data (carefully!). Confirm the correctness of the data entry. Choose a payment method. Complete the payment and wait for confirmation. Diamonds will be automatically credited to your account after processing.

findBigoId.question: Where to find my Bigo Live ID?
findBigoId.answer: Open the Bigo Live application. Go to the "Me" section (profile). Your ID will be indicated under your nickname. Important: Enter only numbers, without the 'ID:' prefix. For example: 100123456

deliveryTime.question: How fast are diamonds delivered?
deliveryTime.answer: After successful payment, diamonds usually arrive in your account within a few minutes. In rare cases, delivery may take up to 30 minutes. If more time has passed — write to support.

paymentMethods.question: What payment methods are available?
paymentMethods.answer:
We support many convenient methods:

Bank cards (Visa, SBP, MasterCard, UnionPay, T-Pay, SberPay). As well as local payment methods depending on the region.

isItSafe.question: Is it safe to order from you?
isItSafe.answer: Yes! DON-VIP is an official authorized reseller of Bigo Live diamonds. We use secure payment gateways and guarantee transaction security.

howProductsDelivered.question: How are products purchased from you delivered?
howProductsDelivered.answer: The process looks like this: The client pays for the product. The payment is sent to the bank's or application's server. The bank confirms to us that the payment has been received. We notify your game/application developer that the order is paid, and you receive your product.

hasBot.question: Do you have a helper bot?
hasBot.answer:
Yes! We have a digital assistant DON-VIP Assist, which:

Will suggest how to place an order
Will help with choosing a package
Will quickly solve common problems
Will direct you to support if needed

To get started — just write to us on Telegram: @davo_dior55

orderDeliveryTime.question: How long does order delivery take?
orderDeliveryTime.answer: Delivery time depends on the selected payment channel. Some payment methods can be processed instantly, while others may take more time. Please review the processing time information for your chosen payment method.

contactSupport.question: How to contact support?
contactSupport.answer:
E-mail: hoyakap@gmail.com
Telegram: @davo_dior55
WhatsApp: +7 (924) 004 0070
An assistant is also available on the website.

createAccount.question: Do I need to create an account to purchase?
createAccount.answer: You can place an order without registration, but with an account, it's more convenient to track your purchase history and contact support.

secureAccount.question: How to protect my account?
secureAccount.answer: Use a unique password and do not share it with third parties. We also recommend enabling two-factor authentication if it is available.

accountHacked.question: What to do if my account was hacked?
accountHacked.answer: Contact our support service immediately — we will suspend access and help you regain control of your account.

internalBalance.question: Is there an internal balance on the site?
internalBalance.answer: No, DON-VIP.COM does not have an internal balance. Payment is made directly at the time of purchase.

checkOrderStatus.question: How to check order status?
checkOrderStatus.answer: Go to your personal account — in the "My Orders" section, you will see the current status of each order.

getReceipt.question: How to get a receipt or proof of payment?
getReceipt.answer: It is automatically sent to your email immediately after payment. You can also download it from your personal account.

regionalRestrictions.question: Are there regional restrictions?
regionalRestrictions.answer: Yes, some products may be restricted for certain countries. This information is indicated on the product page.
